mapper.insert: insert into notify_task( activity_id, team_id, notify_category, notify_type, notify_mq, notify_url, notify_count, notify_status, parameter_json, uuid, create_time, update_time) values( #{activityId}, #{teamId}, #{notifyCategory}, #{notifyType}, #{notifyMQ}, #{notifyUrl}, #{notifyCount}, #{notifyStatus}, #{parameterJson}, #{uuid}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select activity_id, team_id, notify_category, notify_type, notify_mq, notify_url, notify_count, notify_status, parameter_json, uuid from notify_task where notify_status in (0, 2) limit 50

select activity_id, team_id, notify_category, notify_type, notify_mq, notify_url, notify_count, notify_status, parameter_json, uuid from notify_task where team_id = #{teamId} and notify_status in (0, 2)
